definition: a pulpy and usually edible fruit (such as a strawberry, raspberry, or checkerberry) of small size irrespective of its structure
a simple fruit (such as a grape, blueberry, tomato, or cucumber) with a pulpy or fleshy pericarp

a small fruit (such as a strawberry, blueberry, or raspberry) that has many small seeds
a small juicy and usually edible fruit (as a strawberry)
a fruit (as a grape or tomato) in which the ripened ovary wall is fleshy
a dry seed (as of the coffee plant)
a small fruit that does not have a stone inside it
a small, round fruit on particular plants and trees
any of various small, round fruits that grow on plants and trees

definition: A police car. The red lights on old cop cars looked like a berry on top of an ice cream. "Berry flashing those high beams" refers to a cop behind your car signalling for you to pull over.
